pull.title: Fix #794. Only remove transactions from memory pool when they're actually in the memory pool.

events.message: Fix #794.  Only remove transactions from memory pool when they're actually in the memory pool.

events.body: I left this running overnight and it seems to be working fine.  The number of transactions in the pool is consistently showing 34 less than is shown on http://bitcoincharts.com/bitcoin/txlist/ .
How _could_ you remove something from the pool if it isn't in there?
